thread.title: Joe Maddon joined Mike Ditka for pre-NLCS dinner
thread.title_full: Joe Maddon joined Mike Ditka for pre-NLCS dinner

author: Shawn Anderson
title: Joe Maddon joined Mike Ditka for pre-NLCS dinner
text:
Joe Maddon joined Mike Ditka for pre-NLCS dinner Hall of Very Good 7 hrs ago Shawn Anderson © USA TODAY Sports Oct 8, 2015; St. Louis, MO, USA; Chicago Cubs manager Joe Maddon (70) talks with the media during NLDS workout day prior to game one of the NLDS against the St. Louis Cardinals at Busch Stadium. Mandatory Credit: Jeff Curry-USA TODAY Sports
Of course he did.
AdChoices If the Chicago Cubs never make it back to the playoffs (and, really, what are the odds of that?)…they sure are making the most out of their fifteen minutes of glory. Before heading to New York to take on the Mets, Joe Maddon managed to carve out some time to sneak in a meal with the legend himself…Mike Ditka.
And, man, to be a fly on the wall at that restaurant.
Before NLCS: Joe Maddon meets Mike Ditka http://t.co/oxiPQx5mAi
— ESPNChicago (@ESPNChicago) October 16, 2015 The duo met up at one of Ditka’s Windy City establishments Thursday to discuss, presumably, facial hair, their Pennsylvania roots (Maddon is from Eastern PA…Da Coach hails from outside Pittsburgh) and, probably, who the Cubs skipper kicks off Chicago’s Coaching Mount Rushmore should the team break their 107-year winless streak.
Go to MSN Home
